Keywords: Assassin , Martial Artist , Weapon X , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Laura Kinney
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters
I HEAL FASTER THAN LOGAN: At the beginning of your turn, you may heal X-23 1 click. // At the end of your turn, you may heal X-23 1 click.
X-FORCE EXPERIENCE: Charge, Stealth. When X-23 uses Charge, if she occupies hindering terrain, she doesn't halve speed.
BLADES EXPERT: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When X-23 uses it, instead roll two d6 and choose one to be the result.
UNPARALLELED HEALING: STOP. Each time this click is revealed, if X-23 is the only character on your force, KO her.

Comments
November 25, 2022
Xavolice
"does that mean if either of her two die is a 1-3 then the opponent cant use defense powers? Then could she use the die that rolled higher than 1-3 for damage?" No. You pick one to ignore. Basically, the unchosen die never happened as the game rules are concerned. "Do the defense powers not work for that attack either or does that go in to effect after that attack is resolved?" The order of events would be a hit is determined, THEN damage is dealt. So their defense powers are nullified BEFORE damage is dealt with this attack. Super senses would be rolled still because that is rolled before the hit is determined. If they fail the roll, they lose SS for subsequent attacks.
November 22, 2022
Worldbreaker90
If you Pair her with the Muramasa Blade, which says "When this character uses it (Blade/claws) and rolls a 1-3, the hit character can't use defense powers until the beginning of your next turn", does that mean if either of her two die is a 1-3 then the opponent cant use defense powers? Then could she use the die that rolled higher than 1-3 for damage? Also, do the defense powers not work for that attack either or does that go in to effect after that attack is resolved?
August 27, 2022
tidge
Pick any number of ways to grant this X-23 a damage reducer, and this piece will become that much more frustrating for opponents. I appreciate that the bookended-by-turn healing is optional, as it is crucial to have the choice of which powers you have access to at the start of an offensive turn. This is one of the current (2022) piece with crazy powers that I consider to be more-or-less appropriately costed, at least in terms of fraction of a standard build.

June 22, 2022
Redrover454
There's no ifs ands or buts about it, X-23 here is an animal. Full speed Charge + Pick-a-die BCF is stupid deadly. Heal between EW + Attack Special / Outwit + Flurry for whichever powerset best suits the situation. Last but not least, 2 clicks of healing a turn with a last-stand (unintentional X-Movie reference) STOP click on a long dial means it might very well take an entire turn's worth of attacks to bring her down. Her 90pt value and low defense means she's begging to be equipped.
